_header: Jack of Norfolk be not too bold
Subjects: warnings; Howard, John, duke of Norfolk
_description: A traditional couplet in early chronicles, a warning, A.D. 1485, to John Howard, Duke of Norfolk

Unknown.Transcription:
Jack of Norffolke be not to boldeFor Dykon thy maister is bought and
                    solde
